item.description:
This was in the West Hartford Calendar and sounded interesting. Don't know weather there will have a religious conotation. Don't want to offend any one. Call and ask questions if you wish. I will update it tomorrow

Summer Soul-stice at the First Church of Christ

Celebrate the Summer Soul-stice on Sunday, June 21, 2009, 7:00 pm. at the First Church of Christ Congregational, West Hartford Center. A service of words and music will be held to celebrate the wonder and magic of the summer solstice. The celebration is free and open to the public and attendees are invited to walk the churchâ€™s labyrinth before and after the concert. For more information please call the church at 860-233-9605

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Celebrate the Summer Soul-stice
